channel.title: Wrath of Zeus - Spawn PK server
channel.description:
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://www.wrathofzeus.org"][IMG]http://oi42.tinypic.com/2rm7ghy.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://"http://www.wrathofzeus.org"][IMG]http://findicons.com/files/icons/88/mac/16/home.png[/img] Home[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.wrathofzeus.org/forums"][IMG]http://findicons.com/files/icons/1581/silk/16/group.png[/img] Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.wrathofzeus.org/play.php"][IMG]http://findicons.com/files/icons/753/gnome_desktop/24/gnome_input_gaming.png[/img] Play Now[/URL]
I'm now back into RSPS and I started this server on what I really like to do i.e. take a chill beer and PK every single body I see ;) I hope that I'll get some people join this server and might contribute to this server if they enjoy it and help me keeping this server up.
Wrath of Zeus is a PvP-based RuneScape Private Server. It is free-to-play for everyone and provides you with the best combat experience. By killing other players, you get PK points that can be used to buy stronger weapons including godswords, chaotic weapons, korasi's sword etc.
You can also gain 5 PK points every 12 hours by voting for our server. You can also help us keeping this server alive by donating. In return, we'll give you a donator status and access to donator-only perks.
We've just started, but we hope to rise up faster. Join us today and enjoy PKing.
[B]Features:[/B] -99% Uptime -Best Combat experience -Spawn server i.e. almost every item is free to spawn -PK Points system - earn points to get better weapons and armor -Vote4Points system - vote for our server on toplist and gain 5 PK points -Custom WoZ theme and Normal RuneScape theme as a choice -Easy spawn for melee, mage, ranged, hybrid gear in a click -Ancient and Lunar Magicks -Ancient Curses Prayer fully working -Nex armor and party hats are available in game (but are donator-only items) -PK Points are [B]not purchasable[/B] and can only be earned by killing players or via vote4points system -User-friendly commands like ::getitem to search for item IDs of various items ingame [COLOR="Red"]- COMING SOON: Highscores for Highest kills and Top K/D ratio[/COLOR]
[B]Pictures:[/B] -PK Points shop [IMG]http://gyazo.com/bdd9cc8857391d9efd7f4435512b9efb.png[/img]
-User-friendly quick spawn/teleporting buttons [IMG]http://gyazo.com/9b189b371cd417e12f0196d697866c80.png[/img][IMG]http://gyazo.com/f4a19d0d3a8c1ea538f722d1b9bbcafb.png[/img]
-A little bit PKing [IMG]http://i1280.photobucket.com/albums/a491/KetanMal/java2013-07-0216-33-00-01_zpsefdd17a8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1280.photobucket.com/albums/a491/KetanMal/java2013-07-0216-40-21-05_zpsac809b15.png[/img]
-Pking locations [IMG]http://gyazo.com/c1182c0aba19c1c32c1b146f01ec4e3a.png[/img][IMG]http://gyazo.com/bd5964101fe7b8a7a790f88f3132ab6d.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/2228506be84afa36c59e4d9693c9273a.png[/img][IMG]http://gyazo.com/f36dd6222290d9a7f6c54d073d7390b2.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/e903cbb904126e9d60329d75d87bfadd.png[/img]
-Custom theme option [IMG]http://gyazo.com/7cdd001290c7cdc9e916d9101246bdce.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/8e7c76b32f804b844abb8c88eb7a1efe.png[/img][IMG]http://gyazo.com/ef928a45938566999ebec3fc53d82d66.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"]Join us today if you're interested in Fun PKing![/SIZE][/CENTER]

item.title: Wrath of Zeus - Spawn PK server
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:3, topic:524176”]

8e7c76b32f804b844abb8c88eb7a1efe.png762×500

coords/place?

And good to see you are back! Was under the impression you quit. My only disappointment is that after you released that memory leak of a mess you still are using the same disease but oh well good luck![/quote]
I’ll let you know the coords when I’m back online on the server.

I remember you and ah the memory leaks… more like cancer to me, will never leave me till I die. JK, I’m just going to fix it when I get time to take a better look at it.

Read full topic

item.title: Wrath of Zeus - Spawn PK server
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

[CENTER]

Home Forums Play Now

I’m now back into RSPS and I started this server on what I really like to do i.e. take a chill beer and PK every single body I see I hope that I’ll get some people join this server and might contribute to this server if they enjoy it and help me keeping this server up.

Wrath of Zeus is a PvP-based RuneScape Private Server. It is free-to-play for everyone and provides you with the best combat experience. By killing other players, you get PK points that can be used to buy stronger weapons including godswords, chaotic weapons, korasi’s sword etc.

You can also gain 5 PK points every 12 hours by voting for our server. You can also help us keeping this server alive by donating. In return, we’ll give you a donator status and access to donator-only perks.

We’ve just started, but we hope to rise up faster. Join us today and enjoy PKing.

Features:
-99% Uptime
-Best Combat experience
-Spawn server i.e. almost every item is free to spawn
-PK Points system - earn points to get better weapons and armor
-Vote4Points system - vote for our server on toplist and gain 5 PK points
-Custom WoZ theme and Normal RuneScape theme as a choice
-Easy spawn for melee, mage, ranged, hybrid gear in a click
-Ancient and Lunar Magicks
-Ancient Curses Prayer fully working
-Nex armor and party hats are available in game (but are donator-only items)
-PK Points are not purchasable and can only be earned by killing players or via vote4points system
-User-friendly commands like ::getitem to search for item IDs of various items ingame
[COLOR=“Red”]- COMING SOON: Highscores for Highest kills and Top K/D ratio[/COLOR]

Pictures:
-PK Points shop

-User-friendly quick spawn/teleporting buttons

-A little bit PKing

-Pking locations


-Custom theme option

8e7c76b32f804b844abb8c88eb7a1efe.png762×500
ef928a45938566999ebec3fc53d82d66.png763×501

[SIZE=“5”]Join us today if you’re interested in Fun PKing![/SIZE][/CENTER]
